column2: "Iyi nye Amoz ne ba Isaia n'enyido adzehu a ohunii wɔ Juda na Jerusalɛm ho wɔ Juda ahemfo Uzia
column3: Jotam

column2: "Ɔsorsor
column3: hom ntsie
column6: na EWURADZE akasa: Manyɛn mba na matsetse hɔn
column7: na hɔn dze wɔatsew mo do etua."

column2: "Ɔnantwi nyim no wura
column3: na asoasopɔnkɔ nyim no wura n'edzidzidaka: naaso Israel dze wonnyim

column2: "Ao
column3: ɔman ndzebɔnyɛfo
column4: nkorɔfo a wɔdze emumuyɛ asoa hɔn
column6: mba a hɔn abrabɔ aprɔw: wɔapow EWURADZE

column2: "Wɔnda ho mbɔ hom nyɛ dɛn
column3: dɛ hom da ho ara retsew etua yi? Tsir mu no nyinara yar
column4: na akoma mu no nyinara apa."

column2: "Ofitsi ananadze kesi etsifi mpo apɔwmudzen biara nnyi mu
column3: mbom epirakur
column4: na nsoasoae na ekur mpɔtɔwee: wɔnnsaae

column2: "Hom kurow ayɛ amamfo; wɔdze gya ahyew hom nkurow; ananaben asɛɛ hom asaase wɔ hom enyim
column3: ɔayɛ amamfo

column2: "Na woegyaa Zion babaa dɛ asese a ɔwɔ wenyin ture mu
column3: dɛ efer ture mu asoɛe
column4: dɛ kurow a woetu do sa."

column2: "Sɛ dɔm EWURADZE no enngyaa hɛn nkaa kakraabi a
column3: nkyɛ yɛayɛ dɛ Sodom

column2: "Hom ntsie EWURADZE asɛm
column3: hom Sodom mpanyimfo! Gomora ɔman e
column4: hom nyɛ aso mma hɛn Nyankopɔn ne nkyerɛkyerɛ."

column2: "Hom afɔrbɔdze dodow yɛ dɛn ma me? EWURADZE na ɔse: nguannyin ɔhyew afɔr afon me
column3: na anyɛmbowa seradze adɔ me; minnyi enyigye wɔ anantwi

column2: "Sɛ hom ba befir m'enyim a
column3: woana hwehwɛ iyi wɔ hom nsamu

column2: "Mma hom mmfa ayɛyɛdze hun biara mmba bio; eduhuam nhyewee yɛ me ekyiwadze; bosoom fofor na ahomgyeda
column3: baguabɔ
column4: Munnkotum ahwɛ ehyiadzi krɔnkrɔn a emumuyɛ wɔ mu."

column2: "Hom abosoom fofor na hom afahyɛ no me kra kyir: ɔyɛ me ɔhaw; na maberɛ no soa."
"Na sɛ hom tserɛw hom nsamu a
column3: mibeyi m'enyiwa ehuntsa hom: sɛ hom yi mpaa mpo a
column5: mirinntsie: bɔgya ayeyɛ hom nsa amaama."

column2: "Hom nhohor homho
column3: hom ntsew homho; hom nyi hom emumuyɛdze no mfi m'enyiwa do; hom ngyaa bɔn yɛ:"

column2: "Hom nsua papa yɛ; hom nhwehwɛ atsɛmbu
column3: hom ngye nyia wɔhaw no no

column2: "Afei hom mbra ma yɛndwen mbɔ mu ɛ
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse: kaansa hom bɔn tse dɛ adaaben mpo a
column4: ɔbɔhoa dɛ esukwankyɛba; kaansa ɔber dɛ bɔgyaben mpo a

column2: "Sɛ hom pen do na hom yɛ setsie a
column3: hom bedzi asaase no do ndzepa:"

column2: "na sɛ hom pow na hom tsew etua a
column3: wɔdze afona bɛsɛɛ hom: na emi EWURADZE na maka."

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn na kurow nokwafo adan edwaman yi! Ɔno a nkyɛ atsɛntsenenee ahyɛ no ma! Ndzeyɛtsenenee tsenaa no mu
column3: na afei dze ewudzifo a."

column2: "Wo dwetɛ adan ifi
column3: wo nsa wɔdze nsu afora mu."

column2: "Wo man do ahwɛfo yɛ etuatsewfo
column3: na nwuradan anyɛnkofo; hɔn mu biara pɛ mboabagye
column4: na wodzi akatua ekyir: wonndzi mma egyanka
column5: eso okunafo asɛm nndu hɔn enyim."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column3: dɔm EWURADZE no
column6: na medzi mo wer wɔ m'atamfo do."

column2: "Mebɛdan me nsa aba wo do
column3: na medze semina etu wo fi no

column2: "Mebɛdan w'atsɛmbufo ama wo dɛ asɔpɔn no
column3: w'apamfo dɛ ahyɛse no: n'ekyir no wɔbɛfrɛ wo dɛ

column2: "Wɔdze atsɛmbu bɔpon Zion
column3: na wɔdze tsenenee apon ne mba a wɔasakyer."

column2: "Na mbratofo na ndzebɔnyɛfo hɔn sɛɛe bɔbɔ mu aba prɛko
column3: na hɔn a wɔdan EWURADZE gya no wɔbɛhyew hɔn."

column2: "Na hɔn enyi bɔto wɔ nsudur a hom hom enyi gyee ho no ho
column3: na hom enyim egu ase wɔ nture a hom asan mu afa no ho."

column2: "Na hom bɛyɛ dɛ osudur a n'ahaban apo
column3: na ture a nsu nnyi mu."

column2: "Na ɔhoɔdzenfo bɛyɛ dɛ otuw
column3: na n'edwuma ayɛ dɛ ogyansenama
column4: na ebien nyina abɔ mu ahyew
